name: Der Atom Nazi
description:
Play as Atomic Fuhrer in an effort to win Cyber WW2. You got a gun, and you got grenades. If you dont have wits to go along your ballsack will go to the stratosphere.

- Over 30 handcrafted levels.
- Hardcore gameplay.
- Unique design.
- Gives seisures to epilepsy people.
- Blasting soundtrack.
- If you livestream beating this game in under 10 hours you'll get the next game for free.
✡Game real good buy now✡

Make Stalin kick the bucket.
